original_title: OKLO Receives Accolades at FITIS Digital Excellence Awards 2023
original_body_lines: OKLO Private Limited, a leading provider of customer-driven innovative technology solutions, has been honoured with two prestigious awards at the FITIS Digital Excellence Awards, which took place on 28th February 2023 at the Shangri-La Hotel in Colombo. OKLO received an award for ‘Best Consumer Digital Engagement’ and an award for ‘Best Use of Data & Insight’. The achievements were based on the company’s flagship product ‘SmartAuction’ which conducts and manages the Colombo Tea Auction.

The FITIS Digital Excellence Awards is one of the most respected platforms that recognises organisations that have demonstrated outstanding digital transformation initiatives and achieved excellence in using digital technology in Sri Lanka. The awards were organised by the Federation of Information Technology Industry Sri Lanka (FITIS).

OKLO’s success at the awards is a testament to its continued commitment to excellence and innovation in the IT industry. The award for Consumer Digital Engagement recognises the company’s ability to create engaging and interactive experiences that enhance customer engagement and drive business growth. The award for Use of Data & Insight highlights OKLO’s ability to leverage data to create actionable insights that supports companies in making informed decisions.

Speaking on the occasion, OKLO Private Limited, Managing Director – Thilanka Withanage said, “We are thrilled to have been recognised with both these awards from FITIS. These accolades are a testament to our continued commitment to delivering exceptional solutions that help our clients achieve their business objectives. We want to thank FITIS for organising such a prestigious event and providing a platform to showcase our capabilities.”

The categories for the awards and the selection criteria were designed to reflect the most critical areas of business transformation in today’s digital landscape. The FITIS Digital Excellence Awards framework was developed based on the industry-standard Digital Transformation Assessment Framework.

OKLO’s success at the FITIS Digital Excellence Awards reaffirms its position as a leader in the IT industry in Sri Lanka. The company continues to drive innovation and excellence in its services, helping its clients stay ahead of the competition and achieve their business goals.
